title: Trip Budget & Currency Buffer Planner
description: Plan budget with exchange-rate and contingency buffers.
pageDescription: Estimate base and buffered totals in home and destination currency.

sections.title: How Buffering Works
content: Calculates base total from daily and fixed costs.
Applies your FX buffer plus a trip-length contingency.
Converts buffered total into destination currency.

sections.title: When To Use
content: International trips with uncertain exchange conditions.
Long multi-city travel where costs can drift upward.
Planning spending caps before booking flights/hotels.

sections.title: Tips
content: Use higher buffer percentages for volatile currencies.
Separate mandatory spend from flexible spend for better control.
